metadata.subject: Republicans gird for the Donald Trump debate

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein with a Politico article about upcoming Republican primary debates and an extensive Investopedia analysis of top media stocks, combining political intelligence with financial investment information.
